featured.text: Later in the afternoon, Nelson came to Adam’s office with Peter for their biology project.
Regarding the first example, which of the following is FALSE? (A) Nelson was not a responsible person. (B) Adam and Nelson are military officers.
Which of the following is TRUE according to the first example? (A) Nelson and Adam never liked each other.
(1) When he finished with unpacking, Nelson carried all the empty boxes down the hallway.
“Adam Joshua!” yelled Nelson, pushing away a basketball and shaking a toy frog off his foot.

definition.zh_def: 尼爾森，通常指英國海軍上將霍雷肖·尼爾森（Horatio Nelson），以其在拿破崙戰爭中的海戰勝利而聞名。
definition.en_def: Nelson, often referring to Admiral Horatio Nelson, a British naval commander known for his victories during the Napoleonic Wars.
definition.example: Admiral Nelson is celebrated for his leadership at the Battle of Trafalgar.
